name: Monument 1
description: Still from SpekWork's Gameworkers and Guildworkers (https://spekwork.itch.io/gameworkers-and-guildworkers), a video game essay that asks whether the contemporary Gameworkers who built the Notre Dame Cathedral in Assassin's Creed Unity had fewer labour rights than the medieval masons who built the Parisian cathedral (hint: they did not)
